蒩字的基本解释

蒩
zū
草席：“大祭祀，羞牛牲，共茅蒩。”
蕺菜。

蒩
jù
古通“菹”，多草的泽地。

蒩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zū］
［《廣韻》則吾切，平模，精。］
［《廣韻》則古切，上姥，精。］
［《廣韻》七余切，平魚，清。］
(1)草席。古代祭祀时用的衬垫物。
(2)草本植物。即蕺草，今称鱼腥草，一名土茄。
[②]［jù］
［《集韻》將豫切，去御，精。］
通“菹2”。
多草的泽地。

蒩字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蒩； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1049第19
【唐韻】則吾切【正韻】宗蘇切，?音租。【周禮·地官·鄕師】大祭祀，羞牛牲，共茅蒩。【註】鄭大夫謂祭前籍也。詳苴字註。　又草名。【後漢·馬融傳】茈箕芸蒩。【註】《廣雅》云：蕺，蒩也，其根似茅根，可食。　又【左思·蜀都賦】樊以蒩圃。【註】蒩亦名土茄，葉覆地而生，亦可食，人饑則以繼糧。　又【集韻】子余切，音沮。【廣韻】則古切，音祖。義?同。　又【字彙補】子侯切，音緅。【周禮·春官·司巫】蒩館，劉昌宗讀鄒。　又【集韻】音義與藉同。

蒩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蒩字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Pretty
zū
Straw mat: "Great sacrifice, shameful cattle, total thatch."
Scallops.
Pretty
jù
Ancient pass "Pussium", grassy land.
Pretty
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zū］
["Guangyun" I cut, flat model, fine. ]
["Guangyun" is ancient cut, grandma, fine. ]
["Guangyun" more than seven cuts, flat fish, clear. ]
(1) Straw mat. A cushion used in ancient sacrifices.
(2) Herbs. That is, the grass, now known as Houttuynia cordata, is a soil eggplant.
[②]［jù］
["Jiyun" cuts Yu, goes to imperial, refined. ]
Same as "菹2".
Grassy land.
Pretty
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蒩; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1049 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Then I cut [Zheng Yun] Zong Su cut,? Sound rent. 【Zhou Li·Di Guan·Feng Shi】Big sacrifices, shame cattle, a total of thatch. [Note] Doctor Zheng said that he sacrificed his former hometown. Detailed note of Ju character.　Also cursive name. 【Later Han·Ma Rong Biography】Liu Ji Yunpin. [Note] "Guang Ya" says: 蕺,蒩 Ye, its roots are like that of grass roots, edible.　[Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu] Fan Yipinpu. [Note] The quills are also known as soil eggplants. They are born with leaves covering the ground. They can also be eaten.　[Jiyun] Zi Coqie, sound ju. [Guangyun] is ancient cut, sound ancestor. Righteous? Same.　[Word Supplement] Zi Hou Qi, Yin Ji. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Si Wu】Quanguan, Liu Changzong read Zou.　[Jiyun] The sound and meaning are the same as the borrowing.
